Home.subtitle: A novel approach to AI Programming Challenges. Season 1 starting June 14, 2021
Home.title: Welcome To Lux.

sec1.title: What is the Lux AI Challenge?
sec1.body1: Lux is an AI programming game competition.
sec1.body2: Teams are given the Lux design specification. Starting off with a very basic player, teams will improve and upload new submissions to the scrimmage server where they will face off against other teams and receive sweet, sweet rating internet points. Details of the game will be released on the first day of the competition Jun 14, 2021.
sec1.body3: Generally, the competition involves a multi-variable optimization and resource gathering and allocation problem. Successful submissions will not only involve solving this optimization, but also responding to the opposite team. (Think simplified starcraft)
sec1.body4: Each team starts with a very basic bot programmed to make random moves. You and your team will make improvements to combat, navigation, resource gathering and more to incrementally increase the power of your bot. See: halite, terminal, battlecode and ai programming challenge.

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.body1: Sign up to be the first to hear about important announcements regarding Lux AI such as the specifications release for season 1 and updates to the competition
